text: Your smile lights up the darkest days.
Memories are the silent song of the heart.
Courage grows from small steps taken daily.
Some people enter our lives as blessings, others as lessons.
Dreams become reality when you persist with hope.
In silence, the heart often speaks the loudest.
A kind word can change someone's entire day.
Hold on to hope, even when it's faint.
Lifeâ€™s simple moments hold the deepest meaning.
You don't love someone for their looks, or their clothes, or for their fancy car, but because they sing a song only you can hear.
The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out.
